Home / Services / Comprehensive Care

General Dentistry

Complete dental care for your entire family. From preventive cleanings to restorative treatments.

Your Partner in Oral Health

General dentistry forms the foundation of your oral health. Our comprehensive approach focuses on prevention, early detection, and conservative treatment to keep your smile healthy for life.

Our General Dentistry Services

Preventive Care

The best treatment is prevention. Our preventive services help you avoid dental problems before they start, saving you time, money, and discomfort.

  • Professional Cleanings: Remove plaque and tartar buildup
  • Digital X-Rays: Early detection with minimal radiation
  • Oral Cancer Screening: Annual screenings for early detection
  • Fluoride Treatment: Strengthen enamel and prevent decay
  • Sealants: Protective coating for cavity-prone teeth

Restorative Treatments

When dental problems do occur, we offer conservative, effective treatments to restore your teeth to their natural function and appearance.

Common Procedures

  • • Tooth-colored fillings
  • • Dental crowns
  • • Bridges
  • • Root canal therapy
  • • Tooth extractions

Advanced Options

  • • CEREC same-day crowns
  • • Inlays and onlays
  • • Full mouth reconstruction
  • • TMJ treatment
  • • Sleep apnea appliances

Gum Disease Treatment

Healthy gums are essential for overall oral health. We provide comprehensive periodontal care to prevent and treat gum disease at every stage.

Did you know? Gum disease is linked to heart disease, diabetes, and other systemic health conditions. Regular dental care protects more than just your smile.

The Importance of Regular Dental Visits

Every 6 Months

  • ✓ Professional cleaning
  • ✓ Comprehensive exam
  • ✓ Early problem detection
  • ✓ Oral cancer screening

Annual Check-ups Include

  • ✓ Digital X-rays
  • ✓ Periodontal evaluation
  • ✓ Bite assessment
  • ✓ Treatment planning

New Patient Special

First-time patients receive a comprehensive exam, digital X-rays, and professional cleaning at a special introductory rate. Call today to learn more!

Frequently Asked Questions

How often should I visit the dentist?

Most patients should visit every 6 months for cleanings and check-ups. However, some patients with specific conditions may need more frequent visits. We'll create a personalized schedule based on your individual needs.

What's included in a dental exam?

A comprehensive exam includes visual inspection of teeth and gums, oral cancer screening, bite evaluation, digital X-rays (as needed), and discussion of any concerns. We'll also create a treatment plan if any issues are found.

Do you see children?

Absolutely! We love treating patients of all ages. We recommend bringing children for their first visit by age 1 or within 6 months of their first tooth appearing. Early visits help establish good oral health habits.

What if I have dental anxiety?

We understand dental anxiety is common. Our team is trained in anxiety management techniques, and we offer various comfort options including sedation dentistry. We'll work at your pace to ensure a comfortable experience.
